elementValueMap.apiname:
=IF(
    %data:insuredData:beneficiaryType% == "Otros beneficiarios" && ISBLANK(%data:otherBeneficiaries%),
    "otherBeneficiaries",
    IF(
        ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:beneficiaryType%),
        "beneficiaryType",
        IF(
            ISNOTBLANK(%data:insuredData:beneficiaryType%) && (%data:insuredData:beneficiaryType% !="Otros beneficiarios" && %data:insuredData:beneficiaryType% !="Herederos legales"),
            "beneficiaryType",
            $Vlocity.null
        )
    )
)

PropertySetConfig.executionConditionalFormula:
(
    (
        %data:insuredData:beneficiaryType% == "Otros beneficiarios" 
        && ISBLANK(%data:otherBeneficiaries%)
    ) 
    || ISBLANK(%data:insuredData:beneficiaryType%) 
    || (
        ISNOTBLANK(%data:insuredData:beneficiaryType%) 
        && (
            %data:insuredData:beneficiaryType% != "Otros beneficiarios" 
            && %data:insuredData:beneficiaryType% != "Herederos legales"
        )
    )
) 
&& (
    %GetCodeProduct:ProductCode% == "930"
    || %GetCodeProduct:ProductCode% == "968"
) 
&& (
    ISBLANK(%filterErrorList%) 
    || (
        ISNOTBLANK(%filterErrorList%) 
        && %filterErrorList:code% == null 
        && %filterErrorList:message% == null
    )
)
PropertySetConfig.label: SetValues19
